name: rollup-plugin-images
description: Like rollup-plugin-image, but copy image files to dest instead of inlining base64.

scripts.build: rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/index.cjs.js && rollup -c -f es -o dist/index.es.js
scripts.test: cd test && rm -rf output && rollup -c && diff expected-output-bundle.js output/bundle.js && diff rollup-logo.svg output/images/rollup-logo_400b56b4ed60ddf192d2ce94773d26e3.svg

author: DongYuwei
